biotools.summary: BAse COmposition CAlculator is a user-friendly software that combines multiple statistical approaches (like RCFV and C value calculations) to identify biases in aligned sequence data which potentially mislead phylogenetic reconstructions.

bioschemas.name: BaCoCa
